featured.text: Thus, it seems the snake is able to endure certain degrees of dehydration in between rains.
Scientists believe that dehydration at sea may explain the declining populations of sea snakes in some parts of the world.

definition.zh_def: 脫水，指身體失去過多水分的狀態。
definition.en_def: The condition of losing too much water from the body.
definition.example: Dehydration can occur if you don't drink enough fluids during hot weather.
